title: Fresh kaffir lime and coconut posset and cardamom butter biscuits
description: Fresh kaffir lime leaves add a zingy burst of citrus flavour to this posset, a creamy mousse-like dessert, served here with mango salsa and cardamom butter biscuits
ingredients: 200g/7oz self-raising flour, plus extra for dusting
caster sugar or icing sugar, to dust
½ small honey mango, peeled and finely diced
sugar syrup (4 tbsp water and 2 tbsp sugar boiled together)
